elementSpec.gloss: prefixing scheme used in data.pointer values
postal box or post office box

elementSpec.desc: defines the range of cited content, often represented by pages or other units
indicates one or more marked-up interventions in a document which have subsequently been marked for cancellation.
encodes the presence of music notation in a text

elementSpec.gloss: underspecified embedding tree, so called because of its characteristic shape when drawn
leaf or terminal node of an embedding tree

elementSpec.desc: the formal rules of a constraint
